intro_en: Once upon a time, in a far-off kingdom, there was a young advanturer named Pomoro who known for his heart of adventurous spirit. He start a journey to Prospevil, one of prosper village in the Kingdom of Vefurata.
Excited to embark on his advanturer, Pomoro set out his journey. To the forest of Vefurata.
As he walked through the forest, Pomoro saw a mushroom people in front of the house. She stood worried & looked shy.

response_en.text: Try a polite way to ask direction.
Introduce and ask politely & ask direction.

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: *you ignore and walk away

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: *Ifuly notice someone seems approach her, he ran inside her house.

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: Hi...

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: Ohh, emm.. Hi there...

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: *Ifuly look so embarrass and go inside her house.*

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: Excuse me, am I on right direction to Prospevil?

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: Oh hii, sorry...
Can't you repeat your question? I'm not pay attention to it...

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: Sure, so I want to go to Prospevil, am I on right direction?

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: Ohhh, Prospevil.. I think it's correct, but I'm not sure.
Maybe you can make sure to one of my sisters, they went out a few hours ago.

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: Hello there, my name is Pomoro.. am I on right direction to Prospevil?

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: Oh, hii, Pomoro...
Sorry, not pay attention to you. I'm Ifuly, can you repeat your question?

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: Yes, so I want to go to Prospevil, am I on right direction?

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: Ohhh, Prospevil...
I think it's correct, but you can ask to my sisters if you meet them
They went there a lot, I only goes there few time

response_en_contexts.name: Pomoro/You
text: Emm, may I know what is your sisters name?

response_en_contexts.name: Ifuly
text: They looks like me and their name are Bolebole, Agari & Imuc...
Also say hi from me if you meet them, Pomoro....
